resources.string:
"Argos is a project by FRC team 4915, Spartronics.

"
"Argos uses Firebase, and targets Android devices. This allows it to store complex, ordered, hierarchical data offline to be automatically synced when the device comes onlineIt is written in Java. This project is currently in a pre-alpha state.

"
"Argos is licensed under the MIT license.

"

"
